title: Assign Default Values for Object Properties
description: In this lab, we will explore a JavaScript function that assigns default values for object properties. This function helps streamline the process of ensuring that all properties in an object have a value, even if they were originally undefined. By using the `Object.assign()` method and spread syntax, we can easily create a new object with default values while maintaining the original key order.

steps.title: Assign Default Values for Object Properties

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
